page.title: 08TRANSPORT IN WHALEY BRIDGE
page.content: We did a traffic census on Wednesday the 13th of June at Horwich End. The traffic lights control a junction with 4 exits and entrances. The trunk road,the A6,comes from Stockport and turns to Chapel-en-le Frith,here.The A5002,goes to Buxton and to Macclesfield .We counted for 20 mins. On the 13th of June there were 190 cars,47 vans,72 lorries,15 buses,3 two wheelers,and 39 pedestrians going North to Whaley Bridge. Coming North from Whaley Bridge there were 110 cars,28 vans,55 lorries,7 buses, 0 two wheelers and 10 pedestrians. Going East to Chapel there were 95 cars,19 vans,35 lorries,4 buses,0 two wheelers and 10 pedestrians. Coming East from Chapel there were 101 cars,19 vans,42 lorries,2 buses,0 two wheelers and 3 pedestrians.
